item.title: YaraRET
item.author: yararules@gmail.com (YaraRules)
item.description: For this forensics cases which are based in unreliable evidences, we decided to carry out the development of a carving tool for getting files from a raw disk using IoC detection. YaraRET itâ€™s based in Radare2 and Yara, and it provides 58 magic number’s rules for detecting 58 types of files. This tool relies on the idea of a first stage detecting files using its magic numbers and a second stage, selecting or discarding those detected files using Yara, IoCs or its entropy value.
